explains: n. 极度活跃；活动过度
wordGroup: attention deficit hyperactivity disorder 过动症，注意力不足过动症；过度活跃症

sentences.en: Karen complained of hyperactivity and restlessness.
sentences.cn: 卡伦抱怨说自己过分好动和不安宁。

sentences.en: What is Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder?
sentences.cn: 什么是注意缺陷多动症？

sentences.en: The primary symptoms of the condition are hyperactivity, impulsivity and inattention.
sentences.cn: 这种病症的主要症状就是过度活跃，易冲动以及注意力不集中。
